SEARCH
Package peersim.kademlia

Class KademliaProtocol

java.lang.Object
peersim.kademlia.KademliaProtocol
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, peersim.core.Protocol, peersim.edsim.EDProtocol
public class KademliaProtocol extends Object implements Cloneable, peersim.edsim.EDProtocol
KademliaProtocol is a class that builds ontop of the EDProtocol interface to implement the Kademlia protocol.
See Also:

  • EDProtocol

  • Method Details

    • clone

      public Object clone()
      Replicate this object by returning an identical copy. It is called by the initializer and do not fill any particular field.
      Specified by:
      clone in interface peersim.core.Protocol
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      Object

    • nodeIdtoNode

      public peersim.core.Node nodeIdtoNode(BigInteger searchNodeId)
      Search through the network for a node with a specific node ID, using binary search based on the ordering of the network. If the binary search does not find a node with the given ID, a traditional search is performed for more reliability (in case the network is not ordered).
      Parameters:
      searchNodeId - the ID of the node to search for
      Returns:
      the node with the given ID, or null if not found

    • getNode

      public peersim.core.Node getNode()
      Gets the node associated with this Kademlia protocol instance by calling nodeIdtoNode method with the ID of this KademliaNode. TODO: verify.
      Returns:
      the node associated with this Kademlia protocol instance,

    • handleInit

      public Operation handleInit(Message m, int myPid)
      This method starts a find node operation, which searches for the ALPHA closest nodes to the provided node ID and sends a find request to them.
      Parameters:
      m - Message object containing the node ID to find
      myPid - the ID of the sender node
      Returns:
      a reference to the created operation object

    • processEvent

      public void processEvent(peersim.core.Node myNode, int myPid, Object event)
      Handles the receiving of events by the peersim framework.
      Specified by:
      processEvent in interface peersim.edsim.EDProtocol
      Parameters:
      myNode - the current node receiving the event.
      myPid - the process ID of the current node. (TODO: verify!!!)
      event - the event being received by the current node.
